item.title: iOS 26 Public Beta Expected This Week as First iOS 27 Rumor Surfaces
item.description: The first iOS 26 public beta should arrive this week, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. “All indications are that iOS 26 should go into the public beta phase this coming week,” said Gurman, in his
